name: CQ.wcm.CustomCellSelectionModel
doc: Supports multiple selections and keyboard selection/navigation.

configs.name: moveEditorOnEnter
configs.doc: False to turn off moving the editor to the next cell when the enter key is pressed

configs.name: singleSelect
configs.doc: True to allow selection of only one cell at a time (defaults to false)

props.name: grid
props.doc: The GridPanel for which this SelectionModel is handling selection. Read-only.

methods.name: clearSelections
methods.doc: Clears all selections.

methods.name: deselectCell
methods.doc: Deselects a cell.

methods.name: deselectRange
methods.doc: Deselects a range of cells. All cells in between startCell and endCell are also deselected.

methods.name: each
methods.doc:
Calls the passed function with each selection. If the function returns false, iteration is
stoppe...

methods.name: enableBubble
methods.doc:
Enables events fired by this Observable to bubble up an owner hierarchy by calling
this.getBubble...

methods.name: getCount
methods.doc: Gets the number of selected cells.

methods.name: getSelectedCell
methods.doc: Returns the first selected cell index.

methods.name: getSelections
methods.doc: Returns the selected cell indices

methods.name: getSortedSelections
methods.doc: Returns the sorted selected cell indices

methods.name: hasNext
methods.doc: Returns true if there is a next cell to select

methods.name: hasPrevious
methods.doc: Returns true if there is a previous cell to select

methods.name: hasSelection
methods.doc: Returns True if there is a selection.

methods.name: isLocked
methods.doc: Returns true if the selections are locked.

methods.name: isSelected
methods.doc: Returns True if the specified cell is selected.

methods.name: lock
methods.doc: Locks the selections.

methods.name: relayEvents
methods.doc: Relays selected events from the specified Observable as if the events were fired by this.

methods.name: selectAll
methods.doc: Selects all cells.

methods.name: selectCell
methods.doc: Selects a cell.

methods.name: selectCells
methods.doc: Selects multiple cells.

methods.name: selectDown
methods.doc: Selects the cell underneath the last selected cell.

methods.name: selectLeft
methods.doc: Selects the cell to the left of the last selected cell.

methods.name: selectRange
methods.doc: Selects a range of cells. All cells in between startCell and endCell are also selected.

methods.name: selectRight
methods.doc: Selects the cell to the right of the last selected cell.

methods.name: selectUp
methods.doc: Selects the cell above the last selected cell.

methods.name: unlock
methods.doc: Unlocks the selections.

events.name: beforecellselect
events.doc: Fires when a cell is being selected, return false to cancel.

events.name: celldeselect
events.doc: Fires when a cell is deselected.

events.name: cellselect
events.doc: Fires when a cell is selected.
